thread.title: Sonali Kulkarni: Delhi’s fashion sense is what I like the most
thread.title_full: Sonali Kulkarni: Delhi’s fashion sense is what I like the most - The Times of India

author: Pratyush Patra
title: Sonali Kulkarni: Delhi’s fashion sense is what I like the most
text:
Actress Sonali Kulkarni was recently in the capital as part of a play, where she performed for the first time in front of the Delhi audience.
READ: Love stories that didn't have a 'happily ever after' ending
"Before this, I have come here only for film or brand promotions, film festivals and to attend the National Film Awards ceremony. Delhi is the hub of art and culture and it was really exciting to perform before Delhiites," she says. Like most celebs, Sonali too loves the Delhi winter, but there's something that she admires more about the city - the shopping scene. "My friends usually take me to places like Janpath and Chandni Chowk for shopping. It's amazing how one can get amazing stuff for less than Rs 1000. What I really like about the Delhi people is their dressing sense. It seems like no one here takes their outfits casually. Here, people have an extravagant and sophisticated way of dressing up," she says.
